name: crudkit-example-blog
title: CRUDKit Blog/CMS Example
description: Complete working example of blog/content management system with CRUDKit. Includes post schema with title, author, category, status workflow (draft, published, archived), publish date, excerpt, and full content fields. Features 10+ mock blog posts across 5 categories (Technology, Business, Lifestyle, Travel, Food). Demonstrates content publishing workflow, category-based organization, author filtering, and publication scheduling. Perfect for building content management systems, blog platforms, knowledge bases, and article publishing workflows.
